means: 突然发怒( tantrum的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: The commission's proceedings have been wrecked by tantrums and walkouts.
sentence.Network_cn: 委员会的议程因与会者的撒泼捣乱和离席抗议而受阻。

sentence.Network_en: She cried almost continually and threw temper tantrums.
sentence.Network_cn: 她几乎哭个没完，还大发脾气。

sentence.Network_en: I used to get very upset and scream and swear, throwing tantrums all over the place.
sentence.Network_cn: 以前，我动不动就发脾气，大喊大叫，还骂人。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Pisces & AQUARIUS : this is not the best union . the Water-bearer is far too cool and detached for you . your tears and tantrums will soon tire the Aquarius .双鱼-水瓶：并不是最好的组合。瓶子对你太冷淡，常想与你分开。他/她也难以招架你的眼泪和坏脾气。
I've had quite enough of your tantrums .我已经受够了你那臭脾气！
what , you are in your tantrums again !知识分子的名誉要恢复.

RelatedPhrase.word: He is having a temper tantrum

list.key: He is having a temper tantrum
list.abs: 4. He is having a temper tantrum他在大发脾气。  5. Aries & aries : temper tantrums are quite likely to erupt into major wars with this combination.

...时，不是变得特别乖，企图以好行为使她重展欢颜，就是闹脾气(Temper Tantrum)，用最尖锐的哭声处罚她，逼她就范，收回不悦 …
常用的心理学、精... ... Tardive dyskinesia 迟发的运动困难 Temper tantrum 阵怒 / 乱发脾气 Therapeutic community 治疗性社区.

entry.def: If a child has a tantrum, they lose their temper in a noisy and uncontrolled way. If you say that an adult is throwing a tantrum, you are criticizing them for losing their temper and acting in a childish way.

example.ex: My son had a tantrum and banged his fist on the ground...
example.tran: 我儿子大发脾气，一拳捶在了地上。

example.ex: He immediately threw a tantrum, screaming and stomping up and down like a child.
example.tran: 他立即耍起性子来，像小孩似的跺着脚又叫又跳。
